results.title: Bolton's 'father of fitness' to take on epic challenge to mark landmark birthday
results.description: A BOLTON man who pioneered the fitness industry in the UK is spending his 90th birthday this Summer facing a fitness challenge to raise charity cash.

results.title: ‘Excited to open with her again’: Smriti Mandhana on Shafali Verma’s comeback ahead of T20I series vs England
results.description: Vice-captain Smriti Mandhana expressed her excitement about partnering with Shafali Verma again as Team India prepares for the WT20I series against England.
